attributes.action: Align the UK financial year with the calendar year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK financial year runs from April 6th to April 5th of following year. It would be better, for all sorts of reporting, budgeting and tracking purposes, if the financial year ran from 1st January to 31st December. It is far easier to think in terms of calendar years, for example 2007 or 2008 instead of the more convoluted FY 06/07 or FY 07/08.
